title: Screen Writing Workshop
description: A workshop designed to encourage writing of original screenplays and adaptations. Class will focus primarily on the discussion of student work. Renumbered from LTWR 110. LTWR 110W may only be taken once for credit. No credit given for LTWR 110W if prior credit was earned three times for LTWR 110. Restricted to major codes LT34 and LT42 and minor codes LT34 and LT39 during first pass of registration. All other students may register during second pass of registration with the approval of the department.  Prerequisites:  LTWR 110C.
